bgpz_history.description: Since its foundation, BGPZ has been continuously developing, implementing new technologies and improving production efficiency.

event1.title: Completion of Phase I Construction
event1.description: Achieved design capacity of 3.6 billion mÂ³ of gas per year.

event2.title: Phase II Modernization
event2.description: Start of a large-scale program to improve production efficiency.

event3.title: Technological Development
event3.description: Implementation of innovative condensate stabilization technologies.

future_vision.title: Vision for the Future
future_vision.description: By 2030, BGPZ plans to become one of the most technologically advanced gas processing plants in the region, with full process automation and minimal environmental impact.
